price: 4. Kaasoo ka quudiyey gaajo, kana aamin yeelay cabsi.
arabic: ٱلَّذِيٓ أَطۡعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٖ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنۡ خَوۡفِۭ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alladhī aṭʿamahum min jūʿin waāmanahum min khawfin
